name: Slugcaster
description:
SLUGCASTER

A shoot-em-up game by Supernaught. Made for GBJAM5.

Update (10-12-16): By popular demand, we've added a scoring system. Tweet us your high scores!

Controls:

Arrow keys — move and shoot

Supernaught (@_supernaught) is

Alphonsus (@alphnsus) – Code

Dave (@momorgoth) – Art

Music by Drae Cerna
